text:
[Verse]
Sunsets on the horizon
Colors in the sky align
Magic hour's almost gone
Stars will follow soon along

[Verse 2]
Shadows grow and stretch so tall
Whispers in the twilight fall
Every breath of wind does sing
Softest notes the night will bring

[Chorus]
Dream away this moment's glow
Feel the peace you'll come to know
Close your eyes and let it stream
Welcome to your sunset dream

[Bridge]
Daylight fades and night begins
Melt into the moonlit winds
Time feels slow as we all sway
In this twilight wonder play

[Verse 3]
City lights start flickering
Hearts and minds are wandering
Dancing in this twilight gleam
We become a part of the dream

[Chorus]
Dream away this moment's glow
Feel the peace you'll come to know
Close your eyes and let it stream
Welcome to your sunset dream
title: Sunset Dream
